intro: Stenostomum rotundatum, commonly known as the round-leaf stenostomum, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Acanthaceae. It is characterized by its small, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink or purple. The plant has opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is native to parts of Africa and Asia. Stenostomum rotundatum is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and greenhouses.
